I don't know if it's already possible, or even if it's possible, but the ability to move the album art, music info and play buttons down a bit would be a great feature. Anywho, kudos for making Poweramp so customizable with your already amazing app :)

Amazing. Easy to install, and makes Poweramp look like a first-class music player (obviously it already is one) Was not expecting all the customization options, that was a nice surprise. Overall zero regrets. Thanks for making this!

content: I love this skin for Poweramp. Plenty of color choices and combinations. Really the only thing missing is the ability to specify RGB values. Aurora gives you a lot of control over Poweramp's default interface, much more than I expected. Lets you get rid of some of the clutter.

replyContent: Are you using Huawei with Android 7.0 (EMUI 5.0)? If yes then you can't use the skin. I have explained this in the description. Sorry I couldn't fix it
